txt.en: Hard Tack Event: Medium Ore Delivery
Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall has ended
Collect and deliver a medium-sized chunk of ever-burning ore to a mine-cart

'Freeing the ever-burning ore from nearby veins is only half the effort needed. Ever-burning ore is not only volatile but also heavy.

'You can carry fewer of the medium-sized chunks of ever-burning ore, but they burn longer. They will also greatly weigh you down.

'Collect enough of the medium-sized chunks of ore and deliver it to an ore-cart in Ukhbab-gairu.'
<rgb=#ff0000>Avoid the lazy prospectors</rgb>
A sluggard miner tripped you up
Ever-burning ore is needed to keep the cook-fires of Thorin's Hall active. Collect the medium-sized ore and deliver it to an ore cart.
Collect a medium-sized chunk of harvested ever-burning ore and deliver them to an ore cart in the area of the Hard Tack of Thorin's Hall event.
Deliver the medium ore to a mine cart
You collected medium-sized chunks of ever-burning ore and now need to deliver them to an ore cart to transfer the ore to the cookfires.
Collect and deliver a medium-sized chunk of ever-burning ore to an ore cart
Collect another medium-sized chunks of harvested ever-burning ore and deliver them to an ore cart in the area of the Hard Tack of Thorin's Hall event.
<rgb=#ff0000>Avoid the lazy prospectors</rgb>
Deliver a medium ore to a mine cart
You dropped the ore
Deliver the ever-burning ore to an ore cart
Deliver the ever-burning ore to an ore cart
Collect medium-sized chunks of ever-burning ore ([placeholder]/3)
Deliver medium-sized chunks of ever-burning ore to an ore cart
<rgb=#ff0000>Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall ends</rgb>
You delivered the ore
